CustomField.formula: OR( HR_Director_Name__c <> Employee_Name__r.HR_Director_Name__c, HR_Job_Function_Desc__c <> Employee_Name__r.HR_Job_Function_Desc__c, HR_Location_City__c <> Employee_Name__r.HR_Location_City__c, HR_Location_Country_Desc__c <> Employee_Name__r.HR_Location_Country_Desc__c, HR_Location_Long_Desc__c <> Employee_Name__r.HR_Location_Long_Desc__c, HR_Location_State_Desc__c <> Employee_Name__r.HR_Location_State_Desc__c, HR_Manager_Badge__c <> Employee_Name__r.HR_Manager_Badge__c, HR_Manager_Email__c <> Employee_Name__r.HR_Manager_Email__c, HR_Manager_Name__c <> Employee_Name__r.HR_Manager_Name__c, HR_People_Manager__c <> Employee_Name__r.HR_People_Manager__c, HR_Sales_Indicator__c <> Employee_Name__r.HR_Sales_Indicator__c, HR_Second_Level_Manager_Name__c<> Employee_Name__r.HR_Second_Level_Manager_Name__c, HR_Senior_VP_Name__c <> Employee_Name__r.HR_Senior_VP_Name__c, HR_Third_Level_Manager_Name__c <> Employee_Name__r.HR_Third_Level_Manager_Name__c, HR_VP_Name__c <> Employee_Name__r.HR_VP_Name__c, HR_Region__c <> Employee_Name__r.HR_Region__c, EMC_Employee_Number__c <> Employee_Name__r.EMC_Employee_Number__c, Acquisition_Code__c <> Employee_Name__r.Acquisition_Code__c, LEFT(HR_Job_Title__c,80) <> Employee_Name__r.Title )
CustomField.label: HR Info Updates
